// tahseen anwar tahir

// wap to implement float and int


public class t4 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a = 32 , x , y ;
		System.out.println(a/10);
		System.out.println(a%10);
		
		float d = 42  ;
		System.out.println(d/10);
		System.out.println(d%10);		
		
		int z=10, b=20, c=5 ;
		System.out.println((z>b) && (z>c));
		System.out.println((z>b) || (z>c));
		

	}

}
